ontA.label: Cohort (Metadata)
ontA.comment: An ontological representation of the Cohort parameters. The ontology has been automatically generated based on the uploaded Excel Document with Cohort Metadata (extracted on Date: 2019-08-30). This document has been also automatically generated based on the data recorded about 81 patients. For each patient, there are 40 Fields (Parameters aka Properties), the value of which often come from one out of 36 different controlled Set of Terms. Metadata extracted have been revised by technical experts (in close collaboration with clinical experts).
ontA.creator: Institute of Communications and Computer Systems of National Technical University of Athens - ICCS/NTUA

ontB.label: HarmonicSS - Reference Model and Vocabularies
ontB.comment:
This ontology specifies the parameters of particular interest for the diagnosis, control and/or treatment of patients associated with the primary Sjogren Syndrome (pSS). 

The design of the ontology was driven by the documents with the minimum and maximum pSS parameters (D.4.1 revised) prepared by the Clinical Partners participating in the HarmonicSS project.

directTransformation.description: Provides the appropriate Term (i.e., Ethnicity) based on Value of the given Field and the Mapping Rules already specified.
Provides the appropriate Term (i.e., Sex) based on Value of the given Field and the Mapping Rules already specified.

Provides the corresponding Reference Model term (i.e., Symptom/Sign) or not, taking into account the value of the given Field and the Mapping Rules specified (i.e., align Field Values with Confirmation Terms).

Provides the corresponding Reference Model term (i.e., Symptom/Sign) or not, taking into account the value of the given Field and the Mapping Rules specified (i.e., align Field Values with Confirmation Terms).

arguments.argname: UNL and DNL Unit of Measurement

directTransformation.description: Provides the appropriate Term for the specific Lab Test and the Outcome Assessment based on the Value of the given Field, the parameters provided (i.e., corresponding Reference Model) and Mapping Rules specified. Also, provided that the UNL and DNL specified (including Unit of Measurement), the Normal Range of Values will be also recorded.

Provides the appropriate Terms for the specific Lab Test along with its Outcome, based on the Value of the given Field, the parameters provided (i.e., corresponding Reference Model term) and the Mapping Rules already specified.

arguments.argname: UNL and DNL Unit of Measurement

directTransformation.description: Provides the appropriate Term for the specific Lab Test and the Outcome Assessment based on the Value of the given Field, the parameters provided (i.e., corresponding Reference Model) and Mapping Rules specified. Also, provided that the UNL and DNL specified (including Unit of Measurement), the Normal Range of Values will be also recorded.
Provides the UID (i.e., the one existing in the given Field).

proparray.propertyname: Parotid anot performed submanot performedibullar glanot performed ultrasounot performed

directTransformation.description: Provides the values of the parameters specified in the right side (i.e., test code and assessment) taking into account the patient data (i.e., the values in the given Field) as well as additional parameters provided (i.e., Reference Model term) and Mapping Rules already specified (about mapping of values with Confirmation Terms).
